message.content:
Here's a healthy meal plan for you for this week, taking into account the foods you should avoid:

Day 1:
- Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and whole-grain toast
- Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil and vinegar dressing, served over mixed greens
- Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers, and carrots)

Day 2:
- Breakfast: Smoothie made with banana, berries, almond milk (or soy or oat milk), and chia seeds
- Lunch: Quinoa salad with cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, olives, and feta cheese (use a dairy-free alternative if needed)
- Dinner: Stir-fried tofu with mixed vegetables and brown rice

Day 3:
- Breakfast: Oatmeal topped with fresh berries and a sprinkle of cinnamon
- Lunch: Vegetable soup with carrots, celery, potatoes, and a side of whole-grain bread
- Dinner: Grilled shrimp skewers with roasted eggplant, bell peppers, and zucchini

Day 4:
- Breakfast: Whole-grain toast with mashed avocado and a squeeze of lemon juice
- Lunch: Lentil salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and olive oil dressing
- Dinner: Baked chicken breast with roasted Brussels sprouts and carrots

Day 5:
- Breakfast: Smoothie made with banana, mango, almond milk (or soy or oat milk), and flaxseeds
- Lunch: Grilled portobello mushroom sandwich on whole-grain bread with lettuce, tomato, and avocado
- Dinner: Baked cod with a side of roasted asparagus and sweet potatoes

Day 6:
- Breakfast: Chia pudding made with almond milk (or soy or oat milk), topped with fresh berries
- Lunch: Caprese salad with tomatoes, mozzarella cheese (use a dairy-free alternative if needed), and basil leaves, served with balsamic vinegar dressing
- Dinner: Stir-fried chicken with mixed vegetables and brown rice

Day 7:
- Breakfast: Whole-grain toast with almond butter (or peanut butter) and sliced banana
- Lunch: Quinoa and black bean salad with corn, red bell peppers, avocado, and a lime vinaigrette
- Dinner: Grilled salmon with roasted broccoli and carrots

Remember to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day. Feel free to adjust portion sizes and ingredients based on your preferences and dietary needs.
